input.question: For each district, calculate the percentage of charter schools
input.schema: frpm table with charter school information

output.sql: WITH district_charter_pct AS ( SELECT `District Name`, COUNT(*) as total_schools, SUM(CASE WHEN `Charter School (Y/N)` = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as charter_schools, CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN `Charter School (Y/N)` = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) / COUNT(*) as charter_percentage FROM frpm GROUP BY `District Name` HAVING charter_percentage >= 0.6 )

table.name: frpm
table.purpose: Get charter school counts by district

input.question: Filter schools with more than 100 test takers and join with charter school data

output.sql: , eligible_schools AS ( SELECT f.`District Name`, f.`CDSCode`, s.`AvgScrMath`, s.`NumTstTakr` FROM frpm f INNER JOIN satscores s ON f.`CDSCode` = s.`cds` INNER JOIN district_charter_pct dcp ON f.`District Name` = dcp.`District Name` WHERE s.`NumTstTakr` > 100 AND s.`AvgScrMath` IS NOT NULL )

table.name: satscores

input.question: Calculate average SAT math scores by district for qualifying schools

output.sql: , district_avg_scores AS ( SELECT `District Name`, AVG(`AvgScrMath`) as avg_district_math_score, COUNT(*) as school_count, SUM(`NumTstTakr`) as total_test_takers FROM eligible_schools GROUP BY `District Name` )

output.sql: WITH district_charter_pct AS ( SELECT `District Name`, COUNT(*) as total_schools, SUM(CASE WHEN `Charter School (Y/N)` = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as charter_schools, CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN `Charter School (Y/N)` = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) / COUNT(*) as charter_percentage FROM frpm GROUP BY `District Name` HAVING charter_percentage >= 0.6 ), eligible_schools AS ( SELECT f.`District Name`, f.`CDSCode`, s.`AvgScrMath`, s.`NumTstTakr` FROM frpm f INNER JOIN satscores s ON f.`CDSCode` = s.`cds` INNER JOIN district_charter_pct dcp ON f.`District Name` = dcp.`District Name` WHERE s.`NumTstTakr` > 100 AND s.`AvgScrMath` IS NOT NULL ), district_avg_scores AS ( SELECT `District Name`, AVG(`AvgScrMath`) as avg_district_math_score, COUNT(*) as school_count, SUM(`NumTstTakr`) as total_test_takers FROM eligible_schools GROUP BY `District Name` ) SELECT `District Name`, ROUND(avg_district_math_score, 2) as avg_math_score, school_count, total_test_takers FROM district_avg_scores ORDER BY avg_district_math_score DESC LIMIT 5
